```{r}
install.packages("nycflights13")
library(nycflights13)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
#Filter
#1
flights %>% 
  filter(month==1, year==2013)
#2
flights %>% 
  filter(month<=2, year==2013)
#3
flights %>% 
  filter(distance>1000)
```

```{r}
#Select
#1
flights %>% 
  select(month, dep_delay)
#2
flights %>% 
  select(mes = month, atraso = dep_delay)
#3
flights %>% 
  select(-tailnum, -origin, -dest)
```
